name: Epic Game FX
description:
This Pack contain 54 type of awesome game effects fX Ready to apply any game platform or 2d base games.

10 Fx made by 30 Frames smooth loop animated sprite sheet.

10 Fx made by 20 Frames smooth animated sprite sheet.

7Fx made by 24 Frames smooth animated sprite sheet.

15 Fx made by 24 Frames smooth animated sprite sheet.

11 Fx made by 20 Frames smooth loop animated sprite sheet.

Single Frames Dimension = 128×128 px
Single Frames Dimension = 128×256 px
Single Frames Dimension = 256×256 px

For Animation Preview, Please go to this Link :- https://www.behance.net/gallery/74103333/Epic-game-Fx

Thanks
